cards.title: Title Card 1
cards.content: These cards could contain anything, I wonder what I can use them for...

cards.title: User Info
cards.content: Could put some of the user's information here I guess

cards.title: Saved Hosts
cards.content: This card could be for lookin' at the Hosts I have saved

cards.title: New Request
cards.content: This guy's got all you need to get started, a quick-create form

cards.title: User Settings
cards.content: If these pages are generated by JSON, then you can too...

cards.title: My Requests
cards.content: This card is going to be a way to access your past requests

cards.title: Some Other Card
cards.content: I think I got carried away making the json file

cards.title: API Analysis
cards.content: Plug in a host and let the application randomly beat on it until it finds something

cards.title: Rate Limit
cards.content: This is where you can see how much you're being throttled on server-side requests...
